title: Lares shiny Modules
text: Shiny modules functions reproducible use cases login modules visualization dynamic tools.

title: Lares shiny Modules
code: ## CRAN VERSION install.packages("lareshiny")  ## DEV VERSION # If you don't have remotes yet, run: install.packages('remotes') remotes::install_github("laresbernardo/lareshiny") # Full installation with recommended dependencies (takes more time) remotes::install_github("laresbernardo/lareshiny", dependencies = TRUE)

what: Automatically wrap ggplot2 texts depending on rendered size — autoline_shiny
title: Automatically wrap ggplot2 texts depending on rendered size — autoline_shiny
text: function automatically adapts length title subtitle text wraps long texts separate lines. useful avoid trimming long texts rendered shiny size shorter.

title: Automatically wrap ggplot2 texts depending on rendered size — autoline_shiny
Automatically wrap ggplot2 texts depending on rendered size — autoline_shiny
text: session Shiny's session object. text Character. Text title subtitle text wrapped. plot_name Character. name output plot. font_size, n Numeric. Values help calculate proxy length.

title: Automatically wrap ggplot2 texts depending on rendered size — autoline_shiny
text: Character. String wrapped values.

what: Custom Footer: Customizes for Shiny's Footer — custom_footer
title: Custom Footer: Customizes for Shiny's Footer — custom_footer
text: function personalizes Shiny dashboard's footer company's name, link, help mail.

title: Custom Footer: Customizes for Shiny's Footer — custom_footer
code: custom_footer(   company = "MyCoolCompany",   text = "ShinyDashboard",   site = "https://github.com/laresbernardo/lareshiny",   helpmail = "myemail@mydomain.com",   lang = "en" )

title: Custom Footer: Customizes for Shiny's Footer — custom_footer
text: company, text, site Character. company's name URL project's name show footer. helpmail Character. Developers mail lang Character. Language text.

title: Custom Footer: Customizes for Shiny's Footer — custom_footer
text: HTML string (tags$footer).

what: Custom Header: Customized for Shiny's Header — custom_header
title: Custom Header: Customized for Shiny's Header — custom_header
text: function personalizes Shiny dashboard's header logo, links, favicon, font, texts.

title: Custom Header: Customized for Shiny's Header — custom_header
code: custom_header(   title = "MyLareShiny",   site = NULL,   favicon = NULL,   font = "Montserrat",   logosrc = NULL,   logo_height = "40px",   logo_width = NULL,   loadingsrc = NULL,   load_height = "40px",   load_width = NULL,   text = Sys.Date(),   type = 1 )

title: Custom Header: Customized for Shiny's Header — custom_header
text: title Character. 'shiny' app title (displayed Navigators' tab) site Character. URL site (opens logo clicked) favicon Character. Image favicon. Save file www directory. font Character. Font whole 'shiny' app. Use Google Fonts names. logosrc, loadingsrc Character. Logo image loading image. local files, save www directory call directly. logo_height, logo_width, load_height, load_width Integer. Logo loading images dimensions. text Character. Text displayed top right corner. type Integer. 1 complete dashboardHeader results, 2 title results.

title: Custom Header: Customized for Shiny's Header — custom_header
text: dashboardHeader object.

title: Custom Header: Customized for Shiny's Header — custom_header
code: if (interactive()) {   shinyApp(     ui = dashboardPage(       custom_header(         title = "MyLareShiny",         site = "https://github.com/laresbernardo/lareshiny",         font = "Montserrat",         logosrc = "logo.png",         text = Sys.Date()       ),       dashboardSidebar(disable = TRUE),       dashboardBody()     ),     server = function(input, output) { }   ) }

title: Login Module for Shiny — module_login
text: Login Module Shiny local User Password. must added server section (need add UI)

title: Login Module for Shiny — module_login
code: module_login(   input,   session,   users = c("123", "321"),   pwds = c("123", "321"),   logo = NA,   logo_height = "100px",   lang = "es",   style = list(botton_txt_colour = "#FFFFFF", botton_bgd_colour = "#EBB600"),   change_text = list(),   logged = FALSE,   personal = "MacBookBLB.local" )

title: Login Module for Shiny — module_login
text: input, session Shiny's input session objects. users, pwds Character Vector. User password combinations accepted logo Character. Select image logo display. Host local file www directory preferably logo_height Character. Height rendering logo. lang Character. Language. Currently accepted: es, en style List. Possible values styling module botton_txt_colour botton_bgd_colour. change_text Named list. Change default texts used. logged Boolean. might want set TRUE developing testing app module show every time. Check personal parameter well personal Character vector. wish auto-login certain user(s), set values Sys.info()[["nodename"]].

title: Login Module for Shiny — module_login
text: reactiveValues object

title: Login Module for Shiny — module_login
code: if (interactive()) {   ui <- fluidPage("Hello lareshiny!")   server <- function(input, output, session) {     login <- module_login(input, session, personal = "")     observe({       if (login$authenticated) message("We are in!")     })   }   shinyApp(ui, server) }
